title: Reworking Warwick
body:
Since this wolf's kit is boring as fuck: Here is my suggestion for new abilities. 

Blood Scent (Innate) - Basically making his E into his passive & giving him the Rek'Sai circles if this target is in range. 
Hungering Strike(Q) - An ability that cleaves in a cone clipping enemies scaling with his AD, If the target is below a certain percentage of HP clip the enemy with a bigger slow. 
Eternal Thirst(W passive) - passively grants him some lifesteal and an attackspeed buff that stacks on hit. 
Bite (W active) - Bites the target dealing dmg based on his AD and the enemies Missing HP, then heals him based on his W stacks and max HP. 
Hunter's Call(E) - Semiglobal Attackspeed and movespeed buff. 
Infinite Duress(R) - Warwick gets into a bloodcraze receiving more dmg, dealing more dmg to low targets and when he is part of a kill restores part of his max hp. Warwick gains full vision of nearby enemies affected by his passive and can rengar leap onto them once. If the target he leaped to is killed he can jump again and extends the duration of his R buff. 

I'm really bad with numbers/balancing. This would just be a neat idea to make him a little more fun/complex.
